effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Cures [confusion]{mechanic:confusion}.

flavor_text_entries.text:
黄色い　ガラスで　できている
おもちゃの　笛。

A lovely toy flute to admire.
It’s made from yellow glass.
Flauto giocattolo fatto di vetro giallo.
Una flauta de juguete de cristal amarillo.
Un jouet en forme de flûte en verre jaune.

きいろい　ガラスで　できている
おもちゃの　ふえ。

A toy flute made from yellow glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

A toy flute made from yellow glass.
A maniac will buy it for a high price.

Jouet en forme de flûte en verre
jaune. Les amateurs en donnent
un bon prix.

A yellow flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of confusion.

A yellow flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of confusion.

A yellow flute made from blown glass.
Its melody snaps a single Pokémon out
of confusion.

A yellow glass flute that snaps one
POKéMON out of confusion.

A glass flute that
snaps POKéMON
out of confusion.

A glass flute that
snaps POKéMON
out of confusion.
